weakness.name: Undetected changes in audit logs
weakness.desc: Changes in audit logs are not detected. Therefore, audit logs should be exported each a determinate number of days to another place. The exporting of the audit files can help to fix security fails when these logs are analyzed.

test.steps:
1. On the Security Center dashboard, click Security policy, and then select your subscription.
  2. Check that the Data collection is enabled and correctly configured.
